text: Nagash's ancient, decayed body has reached near-godhood without even ascending, and wields the same powers.
Gained by reaching 30 level with the Husk
The Great Necromancer's reign of terror has come to an end, his dark magic shattered and his undead legions turned to dust.
The mistress of vampires has been vanquished, her centuries-long scheming and manipulations finally brought to an end.
The fearsome champion of the undead legions has fallen, his ancient axe  shattered and his cursed soul banished to the void beyond.
